comments.content:
It looks like an emboldened/modified **[Dali](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061202/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Dali%20-%20Regular&fid=5773a0271b0eaa8e5bbb03e92ac5a0c0&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=vix&fit=1)**, which is according to Luc Devroye:

> An orphaned script font made in 1997 by an unknown designer.

[http://luc.devroye.org/dali.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061202/http:/luc.devroye.org/dali.html "http://luc.devroye.org/dali.html")
